title: Onboarding Status
description: Onboarding Status items recorded during onboarding/registration

step_url.description: Onboarding step the user is currently on or last step before finishing

email_opt_in.description: Setting to guide marketing email opt-ins outside of the product. See https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/435741

initial_registration_type.description: Initial type of registration for an onboarding user

registration_type.description: Current type of registration for an onboarding user

glm_content.description: GitLab link management value for content on the link the user clicks to start onboarding

glm_source.description: GitLab link management value for source on the link the user clicks to start onboarding

joining_project.description: Setting to understand if a user is joining a project or not during onboarding

setup_for_company.description: Setting to understand if a user is registering their gitlab account for their company

registration_objective.description: Goal of registration collected during onboarding
